评论概述: Great tee, but not very breathable
评论详情: I've purchased three of these tees already and will likely buy one in every color. The material is soft and provides a flattering fit, hugging you in all the right places. However, I'm removing one star because it’s not 100% cotton, so it’s not the most breathable fabric. Made in China, the shirt is crafted from 88% polyester and 12% spandex. While it offers great stretch and durability, keep in mind:  Polyester: Durable and wrinkle-resistant, but less breathable than natural fabrics like cotton. It tends to trap heat and moisture.  Spandex: Adds excellent stretch and a form-fitting design, though it restricts airflow and contributes to a less breathable feel.  Overall, it's a great shirt for comfort and fit—just be mindful of the material if you prefer more breathability.
